title: Stillwater font ID
content:
Can anyone please identify the font pictured [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143738/http:/a360.ac-images.myspacecdn.com/images01/5/l_c7419c9d672866835e3989296848793f.jpg) or direct me to something similar?

 [‹ Dwell Magazine – I am digging the type – is it their own?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143738/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45465 "Go to previous forum topic") [Norditalia font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143738/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45460 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zap_rowsdower
